## Loading R packages

In the code chunk below, [`p_load()`](https://www.geeksforgeeks.org/p_load-function-in-r/) of [pacman](https://trinker.github.io/pacman_dev/) package is used to load tidyverse family of packages.


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
realis <- read_csv("data/realis2019.csv")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
realis.csv <- read.csv("data/realis2019.csv")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data = realis,
       aes(x = `Unit Price ($ psm)`)) +
  geom_histogram()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
